CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filters.​IgnoredSourceFolderRegex
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filter
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filters.​IgnoredSourceFolderRegex
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filters.​IgnoredSourceFolderPattern

A filter that uses a regular expression to determine which source folders to ignore.  If the regex matches any part of the path, the folder will be ignored.
